name: Ducky Dungeon (Blue_Giant)
description:
WARNING: You will die. A lot.

You play as a duck. You fall down a dungeon without. Sound easy? Think again. 

You have to dodge spikes using your glide, but be warned: your glide is not unlimited. Be sure to keep on eye on your glide meter on the side, and be sure it doesn't run out or you will become exhausted!

You can pick up feathers along the way to recharge your glide meter, or just don't glide to recharge it.

Make it to the end, and earn eternal bragging rights!

CONTROLS:

A / Left Arrow: Move left

D / Right Arrow: Move right

Space (Hold): Glide

CREDITS:

Quack sound: https://freesound.org/people/D4XX/sounds/607225/

Dungeon Tileset: https://genewheel.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
